import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import './style.css' import PubHeader from "../../../../components/PubHeader"; import ComBtn from "../../../../components/ComBtn"; const AddressUpdateView = ( props) =>{ const { updateAddress } = props const location = useLocation() const [user,setUser] = useState('') const [phone,setPhone] = useState('') const [county,setCounty] = useState('') const [addressDetails,setAddressDetails] = useState('') function onClickHandle(){ let data = { phone,county,addressDetails } data.consignee = user data.type = "insert" updateAddress(data) } return (
  • 收件人
    { setUser(e.target.value) }}>
  • 手机号码
    { setPhone(e.target.value) }}>
  • 所在地区
    { setCounty(e.target.value) }}>
  • 详细地址
) } export default AddressUpdateView
